column1: The Fondation de la Haute Horlogerie (formerly known as the SIHH) has officially canceled the upcoming Watches and Wonders show due to #COVID19 / #coronarvirus concerns

Baselworld, Switzerland’s oldest and largest watch show, which has been held every year since 1917, will not be held this year. The show has been postponed until January 2021 because of #coronavirus / #COVID19 concerns
Whilst @LGMRIDisplays has pulled out of #dse2020 citing #COVID19 concerns BUT we also hear that @STRATACACHE are not exhibiting this year (nothing to do with #coronavirus)

#COVID19 claims another victim. Breaking news from Germany, #itbberlin which was due to start next week has been cancelled. The city will lose the business of 160,000 folks who would have attended. Huge impact on the city of Berlin, its hotels, restaurants, taxi drivers etc.

RT @RikkiDoolan: It is amazing that @SadiqKhan has moved up gear in concern after two weeks of #BlackLivesMatter protests.
